name: Isolation: A Text-Based Horror Adventure
description: This is Isolation: A Text-based Horror Adventure, it's a game that is greatly inspired by the old-school text-based adventure games on PC like Zork I for the TRS-80. The controls are fairly simple as there are only three possible inputs: Y for Yes, N for No and E for Enter. In order to progress through the game, the player (yes...you) must decide on which one of the two optional inputs (Yes/No) you want to press in order to choose a specific path to play through. There are multiple "bad" endings, but only one "good" ending. However, there is a simple easter egg that I had decided to implement for those that really want to explore this mess of a game. Have fun surviving!
